summary: React.js portfolio web app for a data analyst, featuring a modern dark theme, data-visualization imagery, and sections for hero intro, skills, projects, experience timeline, contact info, and fully responsive design.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract dark data-visualization hero background with subtle charts/grids (hero-dataviz-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimalist data dashboard illustration in dark theme (dashboard-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Project thumbnail: sales performance chart collage in dark theme (project-sales-thumb.dim_800x600.png)
- Project thumbnail: churn/cohort analysis visualization in dark theme (project-churn-thumb.dim_800x600.png)
- Project thumbnail: A/B test results and KPI tiles in dark theme (project-abtest-thumb.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page portfolio layout with clear top navigation (e.g., Home, Skills, Projects, Experience, Contact) and smooth in-page scrolling to each section.

Implement a modern dark theme with a cohesive, professional visual style suitable for a data analyst portfolio (typography, spacing, and a restrained accent palette such as charcoal + teal + amber). Apply consistently across all sections.

Build the Hero section with a professional introduction that explicitly highlights 2+ years of experience and key tools/skills: R, Power BI, SQL, Python, data visualization, statistical analysis. Include a clear call-to-action to view projects and contact details.
Create a Skills section that showcases core competencies and tools with a clean, scannable layout (e.g., grouped chips/cards for Tools, Analysis Methods, Visualization, Data).

Create a Projects section featuring at least 3 sample data analysis projects/case studies. Each project card should include: title, short problem statement, approach, tools used, and outcomes/insights (using realistic placeholder content).
Implement an Experience timeline section that communicates professional progression over 2+ years, with roles/periods and bullet-point impact statements (realistic placeholder content).
Create a Contact section that displays contact information (email and at least one additional channel such as LinkedIn/GitHub/portfolio link) using safe placeholders in English and a polished layout.
Incorporate beautiful data-visualization-themed imagery throughout the page (e.g., hero background/illustration and project thumbnails) using locally bundled static assets.
Add and render the generated images as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI.
Ensure fully responsive design across common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop) with no layout overflow, readable typography, and touch-friendly interactions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a React.js professional data-analyst portfolio web app with a modern dark theme
Create a Hero section with a professional introduction highlighting 2+ years experience and tools (R, Power BI, SQL, Python)
Implement a Skills showcase section for core competencies (data visualization, statistical analysis, etc.)
Implement a Projects section featuring sample data analysis work/case studies
Ensure responsive design that looks great on all devices
Incorporate beautiful data visualization imagery/visual styling to impress potential employers

projectName: Professional dark-theme Data Analyst portfolio (React) with skills, projects, experience, and contact
